Самые красивые картины для дома, офиса,: The most beautiful paintings for home, office, gallery
Вероника Рокашевич - художница абстракци: Veronika Rokashevich is an abstract artist, born in 1994. in Minsk, Belarus. The artist has been drawing since the age of 3. From childhood she gravitated towards bright colors and unusual shapes. An architect-designer by education, she has always preferred modern abstract painting. She calls her style 'reflexive abstraction' - the transfer of an emotional state through self-reflection onto canvases. The artist uses round canvases, acrylics and markers in her works. She also shoots in artistic videos, where she creates paintings in unusual locations.
• В 2018г окончила БНТУ, АФ по специальн: • In 2018 she graduated from the master's program of BNTU, AF with a degree in Architecture and Design
• В 2019г окончила магистратуру БНТУ, Ар: • In 2019 she graduated from the master's program at BNTU, Faculty of Architecture
• С 2019г по 2022г работала художницей в: • From 2019 to 2022 she worked as an artist in the brand of goods for creativity 'Arteza'
Для обозначения свой стилистики использу: To represent her style, she uses the concept of 'reflexive abstraction' - a rethinking of human activity through self-consciousness. Round canvases, chipboard, acrylic, markers, neon ribbons and experiments with mixed media help her to realise her creative ideas . She researches the influence of color on the psychophysical state of a person.
